params.calls: An array of inputs for each call.
params.revertOnFail: If True then reverts after a failed call and stops doing further calls.

returns.results: An array with the returned data of each function call, mapped one-to-one to `calls`.
returns.successes: An array indicating the success of a call, mapped one-to-one to `calls`.

aaveToBento(address,uint256).notice: Migrate AAVE `aToken` underlying `amount` into BENTO by batching calls to `aave` and `bento`.

aaveToBentoTo(address,address,uint256).notice: Migrate AAVE `aToken` underlying `amount` into BENTO for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `aave` and `bento`.

approveTokenBridge(address[],address[]).notice: Helper function to approve this contract to spend and bridge more tokens among DeFi contracts.

batch(bytes[],bool).notice: Allows batched call to self (this contract).

bentoToAave(address,uint256).notice: Migrate `underlying` `amount` from BENTO into AAVE by batching calls to `bento` and `aave`.

bentoToAaveTo(address,address,uint256).notice: Migrate `underlying` `amount` from BENTO into AAVE for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `bento` and `aave`.

bentoToCompound(address,uint256).notice: Migrate `cToken` `underlyingAmount` from BENTO into COMP/CREAM by batching calls to `bento` and `cToken`.

bentoToCompoundTo(address,address,uint25.notice: Migrate `cToken` `underlyingAmount` from BENTO into COMP/CREAM for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `bento` and `cToken`.

compoundToBento(address,uint256).notice: Migrate COMP/CREAM `cToken` underlying `amount` into BENTO by batching calls to `cToken` and `bento`.

compoundToBentoTo(address,address,uint25.notice: Migrate COMP/CREAM `cToken` underlying `amount` into BENTO for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `cToken` and `bento`.

methods.constructor: Initialize this Inari contract and core SUSHI strategies.

daiToBentoWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Helper function to `permit()` this contract to deposit `dai` into `bento`.

permitToken(address,address,address,uint.notice: Call wrapper that performs `ERC20.permit` on `token`. Lookup `IERC20.permit`.

stakeSushiToAave(uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into aXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave`.

stakeSushiToAaveTo(address,uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into aXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave`.

stakeSushiToBento(uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into BENTO xSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `bento`.

stakeSushiToBentoTo(address,uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into BENTO xSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `bento`.

stakeSushiToCream(uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into crXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `crXSushiToken`.

stakeSushiToCreamTo(address,uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into crXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `crXSushiToken`.

stakeSushiToCreamToBento(uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into crXSUSHI and BENTO by batching calls to `sushiBar`, `crXSushiToken` and `bento`.

stakeSushiToCreamToBentoTo(address,uint2.notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into crXSUSHI and BENTO for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar`, `crXSushiToken` and `bento`.

sushiFromCreamFromBento(uint256).notice: Unstake crSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI from BENTO by batching calls to `bento` and `crSushiToken`.

sushiFromCreamFromBentoTo(address,uint25.notice: Unstake crSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI from BENTO for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `bento` and `crSushiToken`.

sushiToCreamToBento(uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into crSUSHI and BENTO by batching calls to `crSushiToken` and `bento`.

sushiToCreamToBentoTo(address,uint256).notice: Stake SUSHI `amount` into crSUSHI and BENTO for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `crSushiToken` and `bento`.

unstakeSushiFromAave(uint256).notice: Unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI by batching calls to `aave` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromAaveTo(address,uint256).notice: Unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `aave` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromBento(uint256).notice: Unstake xSUSHI `amount` from BENTO into SUSHI by batching calls to `bento` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromBentoTo(address,uint256).notice: Unstake xSUSHI `amount` from BENTO into SUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `bento` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromCream(uint256).notice: Unstake crXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI by batching calls to `crXSushiToken` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromCreamFromBento(uint256).notice: Unstake crXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI from BENTO by batching calls to `bento`, `crXSushiToken` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromCreamFromBentoTo(address.notice: Unstake crXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI from BENTO for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `bento`, `crXSushiToken` and `sushiBar`.

unstakeSushiFromCreamTo(address,uint256).notice: Unstake crXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `crXSushiToken` and `sushiBar`.

userdoc.notice: Contract that batches SUSHI staking and DeFi strategies.
